channel.title: The CheesyKnives [Joke Class]
channel.description:
>## [color = gold] The CheesyKnife [/color] >**[color = gold] Forum Offensive [/color]** **0Iq (Passive)** - Immune to occupation and redirection. **Regurtitate (Day)** - Creep someone out and give them a Cheesy Knife. They will be able to occupy a player or make themselves death immune tonight. 3 uses. **Bastardize (Night)** - Say something to a player that is dumb. They will be not be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses **Cheesy Joke (Night)**- Say a cheesy joke and make everyone cringe. No one will be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses. _Defeat all threats to the Forum._
oh god i think ive got an idea
i was bored ok

item.title: The CheesyKnives [Joke Class]
item.dc:creator: Scath
item.description:
Analyzing Class; Please hold-

10/10 class; Would you like to view the details?

[Yes] [No]

3DT_CheesyKnives:

0Iq (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection.

Boring but necessary

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Regurtitate (Day) - Creep someone out and give them a Cheesy Knife. They will be able to occupy a player or make themselves death immune tonight. 3 uses.

Makes lots of sense, so it should be given to all classes.

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Bastardize (Night) - Say something to a player that is dumb. They will be not be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses

Doesn’t this happen a lot anyway?

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Cheesy Joke (Night)- Say a cheesy joke and make everyone cringe. No one will be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses.

Shouldn’t this be a day ability? Either way, it is a very balanced ability.

3DT_CheesyKnives:

Defeat all threats to the Forum.

What qualifies as a threat?

Read full topic

item.title: The CheesyKnives [Joke Class]
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
The CheesyKnife

Forum Offensive
0Iq (Passive) - Immune to occupation and redirection.
Regurtitate (Day) - Creep someone out and give them a Cheesy Knife. They will be able to occupy a player or make themselves death immune tonight. 3 uses.
Bastardize (Night) - Say something to a player that is dumb. They will be not be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses
Cheesy Joke (Night)- Say a cheesy joke and make everyone cringe. No one will be able to target you tonight. Infinite Uses.
Defeat all threats to the Forum.
